timeline.message:
Add a UI option to configure `autoUpdate` on config repos

  - Remove validation that required `autoUpdate == true` on `ConfigRepoConfig`
  - Also finally write some tests for `accessor.ts`.

timeline.bodyText: Dint find usages for this method.
timeline.author: maheshp

replies.bodyText: I'll remove it. I think I had intended to use it from a controller, but realized it is really the PartialConfigParseResult that I needed to hash. Thanks for catching it.
replies.author: marques-work

timeline.bodyText: The implementation for validateAutoUpdateState has to change to check if auto_update value for ConfigRepo material matches with regular material.
timeline.author: maheshp

replies.bodyText: Is this because if there is an existing material that has the same config, auto_update must be the same?
replies.author: marques-work

replies.bodyText: Changed this to test if autoUpdate is the same across all matching materials
replies.author: marques-work

replies.bodyText:
Is this because if there is an existing material that has the same config, auto_update must be the same?

Yes
replies.author: maheshp

timeline.message:
Compute ConfigRepoConfig and ConfigRepoWithResult etags based on serialized content instead of the easily-spoofed `hashCode()`

This also makes it more correct these now take account of `autoUpdate`; `hashCode()` did not.

Add a UI option to configure `autoUpdate` on config repos

  - Remove validation that required `autoUpdate == true` on `ConfigRepoConfig`
  - Also finally write some tests for `accessor.ts`.

  - Also finally write some tests for `accessor.ts`.

timeline.bodyText: Changing this test to reflect that only materials and configrepos with auto_update = false will be considered.
timeline.author: marques-work
